text: <@UK1BNFHFV> got it, so having people post in “usage” or “domains” with the “makie” tag is not sufficient? (asking genuinely)

text: Can I monitor that like this channel somehow? Ideally we'd have a whole section but I guess that doesn't work if everybody wants one ;) it's just easier to post into the right channel than to post in a different one mixed with all other content and remembering to tag correctly

text: You can set up notifications when a tag is used on Discourse

text: I agree on a separate area but you are correct that if everyone has one, then it’s just as clustered.

text: Then maybe an official makie tag of some kind would work ok. Or would people just tag manually with Makie and it shows up bundled somewhere?
